content.en: Algorithmic fault diagnosis: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the diagnosis of mechanical faults in various systems, such as rolling bearings. They have proposed methods that combine different algorithms, such as adaptive stochastic resonance, genetic algorithms, and particle swarm optimization, to enhance fault feature extraction and diagnosis efficiency. These algorithms aim to improve weak feature extraction, fault detection under different noises, and compound fault diagnosis, among other applications.
content.da: Algoritmisk fejldiagnose: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre diagnosen af mekaniske fejl i forskellige systemer, såsom rullelejer. De har foreslået metoder, der kombinerer forskellige algoritmer, såsom adaptiv stokastisk resonans, genetiske algoritmer og partikel-sværmoptimering, for at forbedre fejlfunktionsekstraktion og diagnoseeffektivitet. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre svag funktionsekstraktion, fejldetektion under forskellige støjforhold og sammensat fejldiagnose, blandt andre anvendelser.
